name: Format\Component
description: Properties shared by all component types.

properties.name: role
properties.description: The role of a component (for example, title, body, or pullquote) conveys the semantic value of the content or its function within the article.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

properties.name: animation
properties.description: An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.

properties.name: behavior
properties.description: An object that defines behavior for a component, like Parallax or Springy.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An array of component properties that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: A unique identifier for this component. If used, identifier must be unique across the entire document. An identifier is required if you want to anchor other components to this component.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: style
properties.description: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle that is defined at the top level of the document.
